name: Olivier B. Bommel textiel
description:
This textile is made from Merino wool handspun and handwoven. It's special made for the Marten Toonder year (2012) and with the purpos for making the Olivier B. Bomel Jacket.
For checkerd textile ...wide 70 cm - lengts 6 m
For red textile.............wide 70 cm - lengts 1,80 m
